scripts.build: npm run obfuscate && npm run minify && npm run copy-prod
scripts.copy-prod: cp index-dev.html index.html && sed -i '' 's|script.js|dist/script-obfuscated.js|g' index.html && sed -i '' 's|index.css|dist/index-minified.css|g' index.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add dist/ index.html && git commit -m 'Build for production' && git push origin main
